text: Deshane Beckford (born 14 April 1998) is a Jamaican footballer currently playing for Rio Grande Valley FC in the USL Championship on loan from Montego Bay United. ==Career== ===Club=== In 2015, Beckford went on trial at West Ham in England. In 2019, Beckford joined Rio Grande Valley in the USL Championship. ===International=== Beckford has represented Jamaica at the u17 and u23 levels. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Jamaican footballers Category:Jamaican expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Association football forwards Category:Montego Bay United F.C. players Category:Harbour View F.C. players Category:Rio Grande Valley FC Toros players Category:USL Championship players
title: Deshane Beckford
